content.prompt: As described in the passage, the voting requirements in Japan circa 1878 most directly reflect the continuing influence of

choices.label: societal norms that assigned women lower status than the status of men
nationalistic ideals that mobilized Japanese men to support imperial expansion
middle-class ideals that motivated women to seek work outside the household
Buddhist principles that emphasized the spiritual equality of men and women

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
